mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tnotice(tnoticeNum, tId, subject, content, noticeweather) VALUES(#{tnoticeNum}, #{tId},#{subject},#{content},#{noticeweather})
INSERT INTO tnotice_file(tnoticeNum, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (#{tnoticeNum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.select:
SELECT t.tnoticeNum, subject, hitCount, created, fileNum FROM tnotice t LEFT JOIN (select min(filenum) fileNum, tnoticeNum from tnotice_file group by tnoticeNum) f ON t.tnoticeNum = f.tnoticeNum
ORDER BY tnoticeNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
select tnoticeNum, subject, hitCount, created from tnotice where noticeweather = 1 ORDER BY tnoticeNum DESC
SELECT t.tnoticeNum, subject, hitCount, created, content, sum(fileSize) totalFileSize from tnotice t LEFT OUTER JOIN tnotice_file f ON t.tnoticeNum = f.tnoticeNum where t.tnoticeNum = #{tnoticeNum}
mapper.update: update tnotice SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE tnoticeNum = #{tnoticeNum}
mapper.select: select filenum AS fileNum, originalFilename, saveFilename, fileSize FROM tnotice_file where tnoticeNum = #{tnoticeNum}
